name: Custom Action
description: Interactive object with a scripted UserAction (doors, switches, pickups)
instructions:
1. Edit the InteractAction script to define what happens on interaction
2. Customize CanBePerformedScript to control when the action is available
3. Customize CanBeShownScript to control visibility
4. Create the interactive prefab with a mesh and ActionsManagerComponent
5. Add the action to the ActionsManagerComponent in the prefab
6. Place the prefab in a world and test interaction
